Company Short Description: Arbree Limited is a software consulting firm based in Dhaka, Bangladesh, founded by Mahbubul Salehin. Established around 2016 or late 2018, the company has quickly become known for its innovative IT solutions. Arbree focuses on delivering customer-centric and cost-effective services, emphasizing simplicity in its approach.The company offers a wide range of IT services, including software development, web development, mobile application development, cloud solutions, IT product design, and full-cycle development services. Arbree also provides hosting solutions to support clients' applications and websites. Its clientele includes startups, entrepreneurs, and semi-government entities, showcasing its versatility in catering to various organizational needs.

Company Short Description: At Neuron, our mission is to simplify complex business operations with AI. We focus on the unique needs of workers and the jobs they want done by creating a platform that knows their business inside out, performs permitted tasks independently, and delivers clear, measurable value.We strive to build the Agentic operating system for businesses. A platform that incorporates all business operations under one, unified, business-context-aware, AI-first platform. Our AI agents execute complex tasks, empowering all business users to make informed decisions and execute them easily, driving productivity, growth, and innovation. Neuron's vision is to reimagine business systems focusing on the needs of each individual business users and adopting to them.
